ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 139
ygData.msgSnippet: Guard Training..... A fellow DE Necro was trying to reach level 50 by camping the FP guards on E. Marr. We were all having a good time running guard after
ygData.messageBody:
Guard Training.....

A fellow DE Necro was trying to reach level 50 by camping the FP guards on E.
Marr.

We were all having a good time running guard after guard to him and his pets.

He never complained (in fact he thanked us) , something about much easier to nab
one returning alone than trying to pull 1 from its post?


Anyway...Apparently a 3rd party interupted by sending a /petition

I was informed that Training guards Or monster to kill someone was completely
against there policy.. A BANNABLE OFFENSE...


now im hearing this may not be the case?

does anyone know for sure...we had to stop even though he didnt mine the
trains....
